testsuite.name: scn
testsuite.package: Parameter type matching in data table

testcase.name: Parameter type matching in data table.scn

failure.message: Timeout after: 3000 ms.: The text '123' was not of style 'BoldItalic'

testcase.failure:
For Workflow Steps in Data table

Scenario Creation, Workflow Fixture, Workflow Quick Fix, Error Markup Fixtures, Comments Style Fixtures, Table Driven Scenario:

  • Create new scenario
  • Create new workflow "Parameter Type Matching"
  • Add workflow step "Step with an integer parameter \"100\""
  • Add workflow step "Step with a boolean parameter \"true\""
  • Add workflow step "Step with a double parameter \"100.111\""
  • Create fixture for the workflow steps
  • Create data table for scenario where data values are populated automatically and duplicates are merged automatically
  • Click ok to create data table
  • Add row to data table with values "string,false,99.99"
  • Add row to data table with values "88,123,89.4"
  • Add row to data table with values "76,false,myname"
  • Verify for error markup of mismatched parameter in workflow step "string"
  • Double click on the error markup of mismatched parameter in workflow step "string"
  • Verify that the parameter "string" is styled as unmatched
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with an integer parameter \"string\"" is below "Parameter Type Matching"
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with a boolean parameter \"false\"" is below "Step with an integer parameter \"string\""
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with a double parameter \"99.99\"" is below "Step with a boolean parameter \"false\""
  • Verify for error markup of mismatched parameter in workflow step "123"
  • Double click on the error markup of mismatched parameter in workflow step "123"
  • Verify that the parameter "123" is styled as unmatched
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with an integer parameter \"88\"" is below "Parameter Type Matching"
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with a boolean parameter \"123\"" is below "Step with an integer parameter \"88\""
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with a double parameter \"89.4\"" is below "Step with a boolean parameter \"123\""
  • Verify for error markup of mismatched parameter in workflow step "myname"
  • Double click on the error markup of mismatched parameter in workflow step "myname"
  • Verify that the parameter "myname" is styled as unmatched
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with an integer parameter \"76\"" is below "Parameter Type Matching"
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with a boolean parameter \"false\"" is below "Step with an integer parameter \"76\""
  • Verify that the workflow step "Step with a double parameter \"myname\"" is below "Step with a boolean parameter \"false\""
    • Parameter type matching in data table.scn:26 org.eclipse.swtbot.swt.finder.widgets.TimeoutException: Timeout after: 3000 ms.: The text '123' was not of style 'BoldItalic' at org.eclipse.swtbot.swt.finder.SWTBotFactory.waitUntil(SWTBotFactory.java:396) at org.eclipse.swtbot.swt.finder.SWTBotFactory.waitUntil(SWTBotFactory.java:370) at com.thoughtworks.twisttests.eclipse.ui.swtbot.fixtures.comments.CommentsStyleFixtures.verifyThatThePartialTextStyleIs(CommentsStyleFixtures.java:55) at com.thoughtworks.twisttests.eclipse.ui.swtbot.fixtures.comments.CommentsStyleFixtures.verifyStyleOfPartialTextIsBoldAndItalics(CommentsStyleFixtures.java:46) at com.thoughtworks.twisttests.eclipse.ui.swtbot.fixtures.comments.CommentsStyleFixtures.verifyThatTheParameterIsStyledAsUnmatched(CommentsStyleFixtures.java:313)
